    • 构造器详细资料

    • 方法详细资料

      • addApn

        public void addApn(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> apnInfo)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to add apn to the device. After calling this, the specific apn will be added on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        apnInfo - The apn params to add.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.PERMISSION_MDM_APN} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate.

      • deleteApn

        public void deleteApn(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                      java.lang.String apnId)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to delete apn from the device. After calling this, the specific apn will be deleted on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        apnId - The id of the apn to be deleted.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.PERMISSION_MDM_APN} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate.

      • updateApn

        public void updateApn(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> apnInfo,
                      java.lang.String apnId)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to update apn on the device. After calling this, the specific apn params will be updated on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        apnInfo - The apn params to update.
        apnId - The id of the apn to be updated.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.PERMISSION_MDM_APN} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate.

      • setPreferApn

        public void setPreferApn(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                         java.lang.String apnId)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to set the prefer apn on the device. After calling this, the specific apn params will become the prefer apn on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        apnId - The id of the apn to be set as prefer apn.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.PERMISSION_MDM_APN} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate.

      • queryApn

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> queryApn(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> apnInfo)
        Query apns for specific conditions.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        apnInfo - The query conditions for the apn.
        返回:
        id(s) of the apns which meet the query conditions.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.

      • getApnInfo

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getApnInfo(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                                                   java.lang.String apnId)
        Get the apn params for the specific apn id.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        apnId - The id of the apn.
        返回:
        The apn params for this apn id.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.

      • addNetworkAccessWhitelist

        public void addNetworkAccessWhitelist(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> addrList)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to add network access white list on the device. After calling this, the specific ip addresses are removed from network access white list. User can only access web sites or other servers in the white list, and all ip addresses not in the white list are blocked on the devices.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        addrList - The ip address list to be added to the white list.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_NETWORK_MANAGER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • removeNetworkAccessWhitelist

        public void removeNetworkAccessWhitelist(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> addrList)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to remove network access white list on the device. After calling this, the specific ip addresses are removed from network access white list.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        addrList - The ip address list to be removed from the network access white list.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_NETWORK_MANAGER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getNetworkAccessWhitelist

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNetworkAccessWhitelist(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Get the network access white list.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        返回:
        ip address(es) of the network access white list.

      • addNetworkAccessBlackList

        public boolean addNetworkAccessBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> addDomainList)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to add network access black-list for the admin. User can only access web sites or other servers which are not on the black-list, and all urls' domains listed in the black list are blocked on the devices.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        addDomainList - The domain name of website to be added to the black list.
        返回:
        true if add the black list successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_NETWORK_MANAGER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • removeNetworkAccessBlackList

        public boolean removeNetworkAccessBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> removeDomainList)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to remove network access black-list for the admin.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        removeDomainList - The domain name of website to be removed to the black list.
        返回:
        true if remove the black list successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_NETWORK_MANAGER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getNetworkAccessBlackList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNetworkAccessBlackList(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Get the network access black-list for either the current admin or all admins.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with, if admin is null, return the global black list on the device.
        返回:
        the network access black list.

      • queryBrowsingHistory

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> queryBrowsingHistory(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to query browser visit history on the device.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with.
        返回:
        the urls of browser visit history list.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_NETWORK_MANAGER} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.
